snippet: An audience of college students boos some of his answers on the legality of same-sex marriage
abstract: An audience of college students boos some of his answers on the legality of same-sex marriage
lead_paragraph: CONCORD, N.H. -- Rick Santorum engaged in an extended and sometimes testy exchange over same-sex marriage with a group of college students during a campaign appearance on Thursday.

headline.main: Santorum Has Testy Exchange on Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
